entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is the referee of the game. He informed the spectators about a penalty to Ireland and was concerned about Hassan Mostafa's behavior.

entities.name: ireland
entities.description: Ireland is the team that received a penalty in the game.

entities.name: mullet
entities.description: Mullet was fouled by an opponent and rose into the air like a swarm of glittering hornets.

entities.name: hassan mostafa
entities.description: Hassan Mostafa is a referee who landed in front of the dancing veela and was acting oddly.

entities.name: weasley boys
entities.description: The Weasley boys are a group of wizards who stuffed their fingers into their ears to block out the noise.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a wizard who was playing in the game and had his fingers in his ears.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a witch who was watching the game and noticed Hassan Mostafa's behavior.

entities.name: veela
entities.description: The veela are a group of female wizards who leapt to their feet, tossed their hair angrily, and started dancing again.

relationships.description: Bagman informed the spectators about a penalty to Ireland.
Hassan Mostafa landed in front of the dancing veela and was acting oddly.
Hermione noticed Hassan Mostafa's behavior and pointed it out to Harry.
Harry was with Hermione when she pointed out Hassan Mostafa's behavior.
